edu.uw.spl.dao

Class JSONAccountDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.spl.dao.AccountDAOs
      • edu.uw.spl.dao.JSONAccountDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.AccountDao, edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.DaoFactory, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JSONAccountDAO
extends AccountDAOs
implements edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.AccountDao, edu.uw.ext.framework.dao.DaoFactory
    Implentation which defines the methods needed to get and store accounts from a persistent storage mechanism, in JSON format
    Author:
    slajaunie
